description:
Snake Slider for the Palm Pre and TouchPad is a highly addictive new puzzle game. The goal is to slide the green snake to the exit. This sounds easy but only the most clever players can solve all of the increasingly difficult puzzles.

The first puzzle set introduces the green and yellow snakes. Move the snakes around so that the green snake can exit the basket. The second puzzle set adds apples and mushrooms. Snakes can eat apples but that will make them longer, leaving less room to move. On the other hand, some puzzles contain mushrooms that will shrink a snake, giving you more space. Use all these elements wisely to solve the puzzles using as few moves as possible.

Snake Slider features:
Beautiful hand-drawn graphics,
intuitive controls,
18 puzzles,
gradually increasing difficulty,
automatic save-game.
